msContents.summary: This manuscript from the British Library was used in the editio princeps of the Vahnipurāṇa. The images here were taken from the microfilm at the British Library. The title card for the microfilm indicates that it was photographed by L. Wicks, on 5/12/51.

msItem.title: Vahnipurāṇa
msItem.incipit:
tejomayānām anyonyam ekasmiṃ vividhātmanāṃ | bhede vibhinnatā puṃsāṃ
trayāṇām astu vaḥ śriye ||
msItem.finalRubric:
iti śrīvanhipurāṇe ākhyā
naśatakīrttanonāmādhyāyaḥ samāptaḥ samāptam idaṃ puraṇam āgneyaṃ
msItem.colophon:
saṃvat 1861 pauṣe māse śuklapakṣe daśamyāṃ
guruvāśare likhitaṃ śivaprasādabrāhmaṇena kāśyāṃ madhye gaṃgātaṭe likhitaṃ samāptaṃ śubhaṃ

binding.p: Bound as a book, probably by the library.

origin.origDate: Although both the 1899 catalogue and Bhowmik 2012 print the date of this manuscript as 1804, the date given in the colophon indicates that it corresponds to January 1805.

provenance.p: From the India Office Library collection.
